service.title: OAuth 2.0 Dynamic Client Registration Management Protocol
service.documentation: This specification defines methods for management of OAuth 2.0 dynamic client registrations for use cases in which the properties of a registered client may need to be changed during the lifetime of the client. Not all authorization servers supporting dynamic client registration will support these management methods.

oauth-client-metadata.documentation: String containing the fully qualified URL of the client configuration endpoint for this client.
String containing the access token to be used at the client configuration endpoint to perform subsequent operations upon the client registration.
